name: Fake Buster 3D
description:
Welcome to Fake Buster 3D!
Finding counterfeit goods has never been more fun.
Choose the right tools (magnifiers, x-ray lights and many others) and find the fake products.
There are multiple levels which you can play with different characters and tools.
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
